about: I'm a full-stack developer who loves building things that actually work for people. I studied Computer Science and Information Technology, and ever since, Iâ€™ve been diving deep into backend systems, frontend frameworks, and cloud technologies like AWS. These days, I spend most of my time writing clean, scalable code with tools like Java, Spring Boot, React, and Next.js.

Before this life of software, I spent almost three years as a freelance video editor and graphic designer. That creative background stuck with meâ€”it helps me look at software not just as code, but as an experience. I enjoy learning, sharing stories from my journey, and exploring new ways to blend technology and design. If you're up for building something meaningful together, Iâ€™d love to hear from you.

experiences.title: Junior Software Engineer
experiences.description: Built and deployed scalable Spring Boot microservices for a restaurant management platform in a backend team. Designed REST APIs, integrated MongoDB and AWS (EC2, S3, DynamoDB), and followed Agile (Scrum) methodologies. Enhanced development efficiency using EPAM DIALAI and contributed to CI/CD, testing (JUnit, Mockito), and clean, maintainable code.

education.subject: Computer Science and Information Technology
education.university: SOA Institute of Technical Education and Research

projects.name: IntelliDoc AI
projects.description: An AI-powered PDF assistant using LangChain and OpenAI, with natural language Q&A, summarization, Clerk authentication, file uploads via AWS S3, and responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Apartmnt
projects.description: A full-stack real estate listing platform with secure authentication (Firebase), dynamic UI using Tailwind CSS, and CRUD functionality for property listings including image uploads.
